snippet.title: VRNinja Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Enter the world of VRNinja, a fast-paced virtual reality game that challenges you to dodge and duck your way past flurries of deadly weapons. With three scenic Japanese environments to experience and two challenging modes of play, VRNinja will put your reflexes to the test as you train to become the ultimate ninja master.

Official Website: http://vrninjagame.com
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/509170/
Oculus Store: https://oculus.com/experiences/rift/922069171248456/

–––

©2016 MADSOFT Games, inc.
Website: http://madsoftgames.com
